user_query: I'm a travel blogger and I'm writing an article about the top hiking trails in the world. Can you provide me with the coordinates and descriptions of the most scenic hiking trails? Also, suggest some nearby accommodations for hikers.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of the top scenic hiking trails around the world, including their coordinates and descriptions.
For each hiking trail identified in Subtask 1, search for nearby accommodations suitable for hikers.
